tool_description: Checks availability of multiple domains across specified TLDs and registrars simultaneously for efficient batch processing.

domain_list.description: List of domain names to check

include_premium.description: Whether to include premium domain availability

parallel_requests.description: Number of parallel requests to make

check_trademark.description: Whether to check for potential trademark conflicts

include_suggestions.description: Whether to include alternative suggestions for unavailable domains

error_messages: Invalid domain list: Provide 1-50 valid domain names.
Invalid TLD list: Provide 1-20 valid TLD extensions starting with a dot.
Unsupported registrar: One or more registrars are not supported.
Invalid timeout: Timeout must be between 10 and 300 seconds.
Invalid parallel requests: Must be between 1 and 10 parallel requests.
Rate limit exceeded: Too many requests made too quickly to registrar APIs.
usage: Provide domain_list and tld_extensions for bulk availability checking. Customize registrars, timeout settings, and additional options as needed for comprehensive results.

availability_results.description: Availability status for each domain-TLD combination

available_count.description: Total number of available domains found

error_count.description: Number of domains that couldn't be checked due to errors

suggestions.description: Alternative domain suggestions for unavailable domains
